job.title: Software Test Engineer
job.industry: Defense & Space,Information Technology and Services,Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing
job.description: are you a software test engineer are you looking for a challenging position at a company with an honorable mission a company with excellent and competitive benefits great worklife balance and job stability if so look no further the naval nuclear laboratory nnl is seeking a software test engineer to join our team nnl develops the worlds best nuclear propulsion systems trains sailors to operate them and provides full lifecycle support from technology development through design to disposal as a software test engineer you will play a primary role in the testing and support of clientserver and webbased applications that are installed onboard navy submarines and aircraft carriers specific responsibilities include but are not limited to creation and execution of detailed test plans for new and updated applications identification and documentation of software defects encountered while testing troubleshooting of defects to determine root cause creation of detailed test reports assisting in the update of technical manuals and automating current and new test plans using automation tools such as unified functional testing uftltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwe proudly offerltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtcompetitive salary package commensurate with experience which includes excellent health dental and vision benefits k with company match and paid vacationholidaysltligt ltligttuition reimbursement for those looking to further their education in a companysponsored degree programltligtltulgt
